scripts.stage: npm run stage-js && npm run stage-css
scripts.publish: npm run publish-js && npm run publish-css && npm run master-commit
scripts.stage-js: rm -f dist/*.js && parcel build ./src/index.html --no-minify && s3cmd put ./dist/$(find . -maxdepth 2 -name '*main*.js' -type f -exec basename {} \; -quit;) s3://celticsdigital/<project-path>/project-name-stage.min.js --no-mime-magic --acl-public
scripts.stage-css: rm dist/*.css && parcel build ./src/index.html --no-minify && s3cmd put ./dist/$(find . -maxdepth 2 -name '*main*.css' -type f -exec basename {} \; -quit;) s3://celticsdigital/<project-path>/project-name-stage.min.css --no-mime-magic --acl-public
scripts.publish-js: rm dist/*.js && npm run build && s3cmd put ./dist/$(find . -maxdepth 2 -name '*main*.js' -type f -exec basename {} \; -quit;) s3://celticsdigital/<project-path>/project-name.min.js --no-mime-magic --acl-public
scripts.publish-css: rm dist/*.css && npm run build && s3cmd put ./dist/$(find . -maxdepth 2 -name '*main*.css' -type f -exec basename {} \; -quit;) s3://celticsdigital/<project-path>/project-name.min.css --no-mime-magic --acl-public
scripts.init: npm run build && git checkout -b dev && npm rebuild node-sass
scripts.master-commit: TS=`date +%Y-%m-%d__%H:%M:%S`; git add -A && git commit -m 'Publish commit: '$TS && git checkout master && git merge dev && git checkout dev
scripts.push: git push && git checkout master && git push && git checkout dev
